attributes.action: Ban all forms of head wear and face covering
attributes.additional_details:
It's very important to ban all forms of head wear and face covering on the streets of Great Britain.
It is a high security risk from thugs, anti social behaviour, robbers, thieves, shoplifters, terrorists in general. Think ahead of the terrorists', muggers, thieves, and anti social behaviour. This is not racist but radical Islam have one aim and one aim only, That is to infiltrate Countries and enter politics and over generations make the Islamic state. GB have neglected to act on terrorism due to the cold war, but common sense should prevail.
No burkas' no hoodies,  and no motor cycle helmets. Fancy dress should not hide the face, until they reach their destination.
